Key Match Events: Derrick White scored 23 points and drilled six 3-pointers
Jayson Tatum scored 10 of his 20 points down the stretch of the first half
Both teams were scorching early, shooting a combined 11 for 16
Houston Rockets' Jalen Green led the team with 27 points
Alperen Sengun added 14 points and seven rebounds
Boston extended to a 17-4 run and double-digit lead
Green tallied 11 points during a 14-6 spurt
Tatum recorded two dunks and two 3-pointers over the final 2:53 of the half
Pritchard sank a 3-pointer with 8:43 remaining in the game, leading the Celtics by 93-72
